text: Fifteen-Year-Old Captain () is a 1945 Soviet adventure movie directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov.ПЯТНАДЦАТИЛЕТНИЙ КАПИТАНУмер Всеволод Ларионов It stars Vsevolod Larionov, Yelena Izmailova, and Mikhail Astangov. == Actors == * Vsevolod Larionov as Master Dick Sand * Yelena Izmailova as Mrs. Weldon * Mikhail Astangov as Sebastian Pereira * Weyland Rodd as Hercules, sailor * Azharik Messerer as Jackie Weldon * Coretti Arle Titz as Nan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1945 movies Category:1940s adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov
title: Fifteen-Year-Old Captain
